title: Quantum transfer learning
seoDescription: Combine PyTorch and PennyLane to train a hybrid quantum-classical image classifier using transfer learning.

references.authors: Andrea Mari, Thomas R. Bromley, Josh Izaac, Maria Schuld, and Nathan Killoran
